original_title: Beyond Us - A Last Story After the Collapse
overview: "What will we leave behind after the collapse?"  We think that if we disappear, the earth will be safe again... It is not true.  Embark now for the last story after the collapse.  BEYOND US is an autoproducted and independent short film, trying to spread a simple message about our civilisation and what we will leave behind after the collapse.
tagline: What will we leave behind after the collapse?
title: Beyond Us - A Last Story After the Collapse
